Package gui

Class Tracks

java.lang.Object
visual.Visualization
visual.dynamic.described.Stage
gui.Tracks
All Implemented Interfaces:
event.MetronomeListener
public class Tracks extends visual.dynamic.described.Stage
Tracks stage for the game, containing player, enemies, powerups, and health bars. This work complies with the JMU Honor Code.
